messages.content:
I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Mark, Aaron, Myles, Viktor

Here are the rules of the game:6 point umbrella, teams are Viktor & Myles taking on Aaron & Mark. 2 points for low team, 2 points for low individual, 1 point for proximity, 1 point for birdies. $5/point, but ups to $15 while someone is down $75. Hammers and double hammers allowed.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Mark","pops":[]},{"name":"Aaron","pops":[]},{"name":"Myles","pops":[]},{"name":"Viktor","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Mark","Aaron","Myles","Viktor"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Scottie, Aaron, Kasey, Joe

Here are the rules of the game:Scottie & Kasey against Aaron & Joe in scotch. $2 per point. Hammers and double hammers allowed. Extra birdies double.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Scottie","pops":[]},{"name":"Aaron","pops":[]},{"name":"Kasey","pops":[]},{"name":"Joe","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Scottie","Aaron","Kasey","Joe"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}
